Billing.PremiumFeaturesIntro: Thank you for considering supporting APM with real money. All funds will go towards buying a copy of Buldur's Gate 3. In return, APM will hide the app start splash ad.
Billing.NoxFans: Bilibili users that are currently "guards" to Azusa and Nox will be granted premium access for free. Please click the Bilibili Auth button above to authenticate.
Billing.StripePurchaseNote:
!!Please use {{biliMid}} as biliuserID in the purchase page!! 
And please restart APM after purchase.
Billing.BiliUserNotLoggedIn: You must login via bilibili to purchase premium access.

PlaylistOperations.clearListMsg: Are you sure to clear playlist {{playlist.title}}?
PlaylistOperations.deleteListMsg: Are you sure to delete playlist {{playlist.title}}?
PlaylistOperations.resetListMsg: Are you sure to reload all BVIDs in  playlist {{playlist.title}}?

GeneralSettings.autoRSSUpdateDesc: Automatically update playlist's subscriptions daily when opened.
GeneralSettings.parseSongNameDesc: Show automatically parsed song names in playlist.
GeneralSettings.keepSearchedSongListWhenPlayingDesc: When searching in a playlist, play the seached results.
GeneralSettings.dataSaverDesc: Prefers cached songs when using cellular data
GeneralSettings.noCookieBiliSearchDesc: Enable credentials in bilibili search to show customized searchresults
GeneralSettings.updateLoadedTrackDesc: Always retrieve the track metadata regardless of cache status
GeneralSettings.r128gainDesc: Enable on-the-fly R128gain (only works when cache is enabled)
GeneralSettings.prefetchTrackDesc: Prefetch the next track (only works when cache is enabled)
GeneralSettings.chatGPTResolveSongNameDesc: TODO: Use chatGPT to resolve song names
GeneralSettings.noBiliR128GainDesc: Disable Bili R128gain, use ffmpeg instead
GeneralSettings.pausePlaybackOnMuteDesc: Android only. Pause playback when volume becomes 0
GeneralSettings.artworkCarouselDesc: enable artwork carousel (swipe to skip; bugs)
GeneralSettings.preferYTMSuggestDesc: prefers YTM suggest instead of related videos
GeneralSettings.useSuggestionDesc: Show suggestions when searching in the search bar
GeneralSettings.memoryEfficiencyDesc: async load songlists from playlists; NEED RESTART! will cause data loss
GeneralSettings.keepForegroundDesc: enable to waste a LOT of battery
GeneralSettings.audioOffloadDesc: enable audio offload to a dedicated processsor (may save battery)
GeneralSettings.parseEmbeddedArtworkDesc: Parse embedded artwork 1 additional time for android auto (will slow local playback otherwise!!).
GeneralSettings.skipSilenceDesc: skip segments with no audio (exoplayer feature)
GeneralSettings.biliEditAPIDesc: use bilibili edit API when renaming songs
GeneralSettings.screenAlwaysWakeDesc: turn screen always on at lyric screen
GeneralSettings.fastBiliSearchDesc: Do not search for bilibili video episodes.
GeneralSettings.suggestedSkipLongVideoDesc: Skip > 10 min videos when in playing suggested mode.

DeveloperSettings.artworkResDesc: rescale artwork resolution during scaling (why? i dont know)
DeveloperSettings.VersionCheckDesc: Check latest version released on github.
DeveloperSettings.noInterruptionDesc: Disables Event.RemoteDuck to prevent interruption (NEED RESTART)
DeveloperSettings.CacheSizeDesc: Disables Event.RemoteDuck to prevent interruption (NEED RESTART)
DeveloperSettings.CacheSizeDesc2: Currently set to hold a max of {{val}} songs in cache (NEED RESTART).

Settings.PluginsSettingDesc: Plugins may modify app behavior. Continue with discretion.
Settings.DeveloperOptionsDesc: Experimental Options in pre-release versions of APM

PluginSettings.UpdateFailRegExpFromGithub: Updated RegExp rules from GitHub FAILED.
PluginSettings.UpdateFailR128GainFromGithub: Updated R128Gain rules from GitHub FAILED.
PluginSettings.UpdateFailABRepeatFromGithub: Updated ABRepeat rules from GitHub FAILED.
PluginSettings.MusicFreeDesc: Do NOT use, uve been warned.

AppearanceSettings.accentColorDesc: Use accent color from song covers when not using weeb skins
AppearanceSettings.wavyProgressBarDesc: Show a wavy progress bar (huge battery drain)
AppearanceSettings.trackCoverArtCardDesc: Show a song's cover art when selected

Sync.DropboxUploadFail: APM playlists failed to sync 2 dropbox
Sync.DropboxUploadFailSnackbar: APM playlists failed to sync to Dropbox!
Sync.DropboxDownloadFailSnackbar: APM playlists failed to sync from dropbox
Sync.PersonalCloudUploadFailSnackbar: 歌单上传到PersonalCloud失败，错误记录在控制台里
Sync.PersonalCloudDownloadFailSnackbar: 歌单同步到PersonalCloud失败，错误记录在控制台里
Sync.PersonalCloudKeySuggestion: If you're syncing with NoxPlayer the extension, please use your BILIBILI USER NAME as key
Sync.NoxExtensionImportMsg: How do you want to import playlists from noxplayer?

Login.BilibiliLoginQRGenerated: Scan QR code in Bilibili app to login
Login.BilibiliLoginQRGenerateFailed: Bilibili QR code generation failed. Please check network.
Login.BilibiliLoginQRExpired: Bilibili QR code expired. Regenerate to login.
Login.BilibiliLoginProbeFailed: Checking QR code login status failed. Please check network.
Login.Disclaimer: Using bilibili cookies in this app may BAN your account/IP due to API abuse. At the very least use a spare account.

VersionUpdate.DownloadingAPK: Downloading the latest APM armv8 APK...
VersionUpdate.UpdatedVersionAlertContent: Noxplayer updated to version {{version}}! Check out the release notes at github.

CustomSkin.SearchFailMsg: Failed to load custom skin JSON file

About.Disclaimer1: This project and its contents are not affiliated with, funded, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way associated with Bilibili Inc. or any of its affiliates and subsidiaries. (But we really want to, call us)
About.Disclaimer2: Any trademark, service mark, trade name, or other intellectual property rights used in this project are owned by the respective owners.
About.About1: APM is an open source software. You may find the source code of APM at github.com/lovegaoshi/azusa-player-mobile free of charge. Please consider adding your music stream cuts on bilibili via the video series list functionality with keywords to add videos into the series list automatically.

PlaylistAnalytics.title: Playlist Analytics of {{val}}
PlaylistAnalytics.avg: Playlist contains a total of {{val1}} bvids, and {{val2}} songs per bvid on average;
